name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer (Back End) with 8 years of comprehensive experience specializing in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **PHP** development within microservices architectures. Proven track record in designing and optimizing **distributed systems** utilizing **RabbitMQ** for efficient message brokering and ensuring robust **observability** and **monitoring** for high-performance applications. Skilled in infrastructure management and problem-solving to deliver reliable solutions tailored for complex environments. 
I possess expertise in modern development frameworks and tools including **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, enriched by deep cloud expertise with **Azure** and **AWS**. My strengths also encompass leading enterprise-grade projects, implementing CI/CD automation, and developing secure systems compliant with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
